de.sarahw.ma.phone
Class IdeaCreationActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  de.sarahw.ma.phone.IdeaCreationActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, KeyEvent.Callback, LayoutInflater.Factory, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, Window.Callback
public class IdeaCreationActivity
extends Activity

The IdeaNode text creation activity. Includes a edit field, a create button and the current list of ideaNode texts.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sarah Will
